docs.lead_paragraph: To what extent can psychotic behaviorr induced or occurring naturally in animals be used to understand better such behavior in human beings?

headline.main: Animals' Psychotic Acts Called Uncertain Guide

docs.abstract: Article on recent symposium on relevance of animal psychopathological models to the human sponsored by Kittay Foundation; Dr Robert A Hinde describes effects of mother-infant separation on infant's adult behavior (M)
